description:
Ryo visits a lonely girl confined to a wheelchair, only to find that she`s being targeted by a killer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wanting to Fall in Love Just Like a Dream. The Strategy of a Twelve Year-Old Angel (Part 1)
Yume Miru You ni Koishitai, 12 Sai Tenshi no Sakusen (Zenpen)
夢みるように恋したい 12歳天使の作戦(前編)
